channel.title: How to make a npc without moddeling EASY

item.title: How to make a npc without moddeling EASY
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

A nicer way:

npcs.xml

<definitions>
    <npc id="0" revision="317">
        <options>
            <option>Attack</option>
            <option>Trade</option>
        </options>
        <equipment>
            <head>7203</head>
        </equipment>
    </npc>
</definitions>

Or something similar. Decreases the size of the source files, and makes the code cleaner.

Also, not a tutorial. You could however edit this post to make it a tutorial, but even still it would belong in the Client Hacking section.

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a npc without moddeling EASY

item.title: How to make a npc without moddeling EASY
item.dc:creator: @frenkerscape frenkerscape
item.description:
@frenkerscape wrote:

Base: Delta
Difficulty: 2/10

Watch Video: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-diYkWZfgEo

open your client folder and open the file “class5” add this if(i == 9 { aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_60.anInt1406 = anIntArray72[630]; class5.method165(true, aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_60); class5.aStringArray66 = new String[5]; class5.aStringArray66[1] = "Attack"; class5.anIntArray76 = new int[3]; class5.anIntArray70 = new int[3]; class5.anIntArray76[0] = 61; class5.anIntArray70[0] = 926; class5.anIntArray76[1] = 43074; class5.anIntArray70[1] = 926; class5.anIntArray76[2] = 43086; class5.anIntArray70[2] = 1709; class5.anIntArray94 = new int[9]; class5.anIntArray94[0] = 7203; //helm class5.anIntArray94[1] = 3821; //plate class5.anIntArray94[2] = 332; //kite class5.anIntArray94[3] = 13698; //wep class5.anIntArray94[4] = 5025; //legs class5.anIntArray94[5] = 9640; //cape class5.anIntArray94[6] = 4680; //boots class5.anIntArray94[7] = 13319; //gloves class5.anIntArray94[8] = 9644; //amulet class5.anInt55 = 822;//walkright class5.anInt67 = 819;//normal walk class5.anInt77 = 808;//stand animation class5.anInt79 = 32;//Degress to turn class5.anInt83 = 821;//walk left animation class5.aString65 = "Name here"; class5.anInt61 = 380; class5.aByteArray89 = "examine here".getBytes(); }
search for item’s in the itemdump or in your class8 for costum item’s like statius or something
link for itemdump: http://uppit.com/a4zrvz8kq9gb/costum_npc.rar

if you don’t understand it say it and i will make the tut better with screen shots

Read full topic
